channel.title: Economy on Partially Attended
channel.description: Recent content in Economy on Partially Attended

item.title: Computer replaces workers, workers ty to turn into data scientists.
item.description: http://www.latimes.com/business/technology/la-fi-tn-automation-training-20180504-story.html The headline is a bit click-baitey. I think the big takeaway from this article is that there is a significant shift in how companies are doing training with the advent of online learning. Unsurprising, but hopefully good news for efforts like sage campus.
